Rule.name: SafNet AccountApplication AfterRule
Rule.Description: The Web Services connector will call this rule after performing ANY defined operation. This rule can be used to update the parsed resource object and/or add persistent values to the application's data. (See information about what to return for more information)

Argument.name: log
Argument.Description: The log object associated with the SailPointContext.

Argument.name: context
Argument.Description: A sailpoint.api.SailPointContext object that can be used to query the database if necessary.

Argument.name: application
Argument.Description: The application whose data file is being processed.

Argument.name: requestEndPoint
Argument.Description: The current request information contain header, body ,response object

Argument.name: processedResponseObject
Argument.Description: Response Object processed by the Web services connector

Argument.name: rawResponseObject
Argument.Description: Response Object returned from the end system

Argument.name: Map
Argument.Description: A newly created map containing a 'data' key and optionally, a 'connectorStateMap' key. The 'data' value should be set to a map containing a parsed list of accounts/groups. The 'connectorStateMap' value can be set to a map containing values that will be persisted to the application definition.
